panels.description: Total datapoints received per second (OTLP + PRW)
Percentage of datapoints dropped by limits. Green=healthy, Yellow=warning, Red=critical
Queue utilization percentage. Green=healthy, Yellow=filling up, Red=nearly full
Total datapoints sent to backend per second (OTLP + PRW)
